00044 // Auxillary data decls ...
00045 //
00046 // data that is passed per-event in the userData parameter
00047 // 
00048 // ( for some, but not all, events )

00050 //-- new object notification

00053 
00054 struct EvtData_New_Actor : public IEventData
00055 {
00056         explicit EvtData_New_Actor( ActorId id,
00057                                                           ActorParams *pCreateParams)
00058         {
00059                 m_id = id;
00060                 m_pActorParams = reinterpret_cast<ActorParams *>(GCC_NEW char[pCreateParams->GetSize()]);
00061                 memcpy(m_pActorParams, pCreateParams, pCreateParams->GetSize());
00062         }
00063 
00064         ~EvtData_New_Actor() { SAFE_DELETE(m_pActorParams); }
00065 
00066         ActorId m_id;
00067         ActorParams *m_pActorParams;
00068 };
00069 
00070 
00071 class Evt_New_Actor: public Event
00072 {
00073 public:
00074         static char const * const gkName;
00075         
00076         explicit Evt_New_Actor( ActorId id,
00077                                                          ActorParams *pCreateParams)
00078                 : Event( gkName,
00079                                         0,
00080                                         IEventDataPtr(
00081                                                 GCC_NEW EvtData_New_Actor( id,
00082                                                                                                  pCreateParams) ) )
00083         {}
00084 
00085 
00086         explicit Evt_New_Actor(std::istrstream &in)
00087                 : Event( gkName )
00088         {
00089                 int id;
00090                 in >> id;
00091                 ActorParams *actorParams = ActorParams::CreateFromStream(in);
00092                 
00093                 setDataPtr(IEventDataPtr(GCC_NEW EvtData_New_Actor( id, actorParams) ) );
00094         }
00095 
00096         virtual void serialize(std::ostrstream &out) const
00097         {
00098                 EvtData_New_Actor *pData = getDataPtr<EvtData_New_Actor>();
00099                 out << pData->m_id << " ";
00100                 pData->m_pActorParams->VSerialize(out);
00101         }
00102 
00103 };
00104 
00105 class Evt_Destroy_Actor : public Event
00106 {
00107 public:
00108         static char const * const gkName;
00109         explicit Evt_Destroy_Actor(ActorId id)          
00110                 : Event( gkName,
00111                                         0,
00112                                         IEventDataPtr(GCC_NEW EvtData<ActorId>(id) ) )
00113         {}
00114 
00115         explicit Evt_Destroy_Actor(std::istrstream &in)
00116                 : Event( gkName )
00117         {
00118                 int id;
00119                 in >> id;               
00120                 setDataPtr(IEventDataPtr(IEventDataPtr(GCC_NEW EvtData<ActorId>(id) ) ) );
00121         }
00122 
00123         virtual void serialize(std::ostrstream &out) const
00124         {
00125                 ActorId aid = getDataPtr<EvtData<ActorId> >()->GetValue();
00126                 out << aid << " ";
00127         }
00128 
00129 };

00132 struct EvtData_Move_Actor : public IEventData
00133 {
00134         explicit EvtData_Move_Actor( ActorId id,  Mat4x4 mat)
00135         {
00136                 m_Id = id;
00137                 m_Mat = mat;
00138         }
00139 
00140         ActorId m_Id;
00141         Mat4x4 m_Mat;
00142 };
00143 
00144 class Evt_Move_Actor: public Event
00145 {
00146 public:
00147         static char const * const gkName;
00148         
00149         explicit Evt_Move_Actor( ActorId id, Mat4x4 mat )
00150                 : Event( gkName,
00151                                         0,
00152                                         IEventDataPtr(
00153                                                 GCC_NEW EvtData_Move_Actor( id, mat ) ) )
00154         {}
00155 
00156         Evt_Move_Actor(std::istrstream &in)
00157                 : Event( gkName )
00158         {
00159                 ActorId id;
00160                 Mat4x4 mat;
00161                 in >> id;
00162                 for (int i=0; i<4; ++i)
00163                 {
00164                         for (int j=0; j<4; ++j)
00165                         {
00166                                 in >> mat.m[i][j];
00167                         }
00168                 }
00169                 setDataPtr(IEventDataPtr(GCC_NEW EvtData_Move_Actor(id, mat ) ) );
00170         }
00171 
00172         virtual void serialize(std::ostrstream &out) const
00173         {
00174                 EvtData_Move_Actor *pData = getDataPtr<EvtData_Move_Actor>();
00175                 out << pData->m_Id << " ";
00176                 for (int i=0; i<4; ++i)
00177                 {
00178                         for (int j=0; j<4; ++j)
00179                         {
00180                                 out << pData->m_Mat.m[i][j] << " ";
00181                         }
00182                 }
00183         }
00184 
00185 };

00203 class Evt_Game_State : public Event
00204 {
00205 public:
00206         static char const * const gkName;
00207         explicit Evt_Game_State(BaseGameState value) 
00208                 : Event( gkName,
00209                                         0,
00210                                         IEventDataPtr(
00211                                                 GCC_NEW EvtData<BaseGameState>( value ) ) )
00212         {}
00213 
00214         Evt_Game_State(std::istrstream &in)
00215                 : Event( gkName )
00216         {
00217                 int value;
00218                 in >> value;
00219                 setDataPtr(IEventDataPtr(GCC_NEW EvtData<BaseGameState>(static_cast<BaseGameState>(value) ) ) );
00220         }
00221 
00222         virtual void serialize(std::ostrstream &out) const
00223         {
00224                 BaseGameState value = getDataPtr<EvtData<BaseGameState> >()->GetValue();
00225                 out << static_cast<int>(value) << " ";
00226         }
00227 };
